name: Hyde & Seek (itch)
description:
Hyde is a Global Game Jam 2022 entry that is about solving puzzles. The Jam was 48 hours but this is about 18-20 hours of work.

using the 'Brxu Vhfuhw lv Vdih zlwk Ph' diversifier.  There is a CODE in the game that requires use of both Hyde and Jekyll.

A MOVES LEFT
D MOVES RIGHT

E TO INTERACT WITH STUFF

ESC TO PAUSE

IT IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED YOU PAUSE THE GAME AND ACTIVATE EASY MODE... The potion mechanic is not properly implemented so normal mode will be nigh impossible to complete.

MAJOR WIP - there is only 1 puzzle right now, there was meant to be several spread across the whole mansion but I ran out of time and hit some bugs that took a while to fix :)
